title: Reservation Details
description: Reservation details such as length, modification, refundable status, and number of guests.

xdm:flightDetail.description: Utilized when capturing any flight details with a reservation.

xdm:destinationAirportCode.title: Destination Airport Code
xdm:destinationAirportCode.description: Three letter airport code indicating the destination city of the flight.

xdm:fareClass.title: Fare Class
xdm:fareClass.description: The fare class of the flight being reserved.

xdm:flightDate.title: Flight Date
xdm:flightDate.description: The date of the flight being reserved.

xdm:flightNumber.title: Flight Number
xdm:flightNumber.description: The flight number for the flight being reserved.

xdm:originAirportCode.title: Origin Airport Code
xdm:originAirportCode.description: Three letter airport code indicating the origin city of the flight

xdm:lodgingDetail.description: Utilized when capturing any lodging details with a reservation.

xdm:checkInDate.title: Check-In Date
xdm:checkInDate.description: The check-in date of the for the lodging reservation.

xdm:checkOutDate.title: Check-Out Date
xdm:checkOutDate.description: The check-out date of the for the lodging reservation.

xdm:numberOfRooms.title: Number of Rooms
xdm:numberOfRooms.description: Captures the number of rooms associated with the reservation.

xdm:propertyID.title: Property ID
xdm:propertyID.description: Identifier of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Name of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:lodgingAccessibilityType.title: Lodging Accessibility Type
xdm:lodgingAccessibilityType.description: Type of accessible lodging, such as mobility, hearing, or other.

xdm:lodgingType.title: Lodging Type
xdm:lodgingType.description: Captures the type of lodging being reserved.

xdm:lodgingDetail.description: Array of all lodging bookings in a reservation

xdm:vehicleDetail.description: Utilized when capturing any vehicle details with a reservation.

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent ID associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:averageDailyPrice.title: Average Daily Price
xdm:averageDailyPrice.description: Average daily price of the vehicle.

xdm:basePrice.title: Base Price
xdm:basePrice.description: Base price before any discounts are added.

xdm:couponCode.title: Coupon Code
xdm:couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
xdm:discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

xdm:dropOffDate.title: Drop-off Date
xdm:dropOffDate.description: The drop-off date of the for the vehicle reservation.

xdm:guestID.title: Guest ID
xdm:guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the vehicle booking.

xdm:pickUpDate.title: Pick-up Date
xdm:pickUpDate.description: The pick-up date of the for the vehicle reservation.

xdm:rentersAge.title: Renter's Age
xdm:rentersAge.description: Age of the renter on the vehicle reservation.

xdm:vehicleClass.title: Vehicle Class
xdm:vehicleClass.description: The class/category of vehicle being reserved.

xdm:vehicleDropOffLocationCode.title: Drop-off Location Code
xdm:vehicleDropOffLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle drop off.

xdm:vehiclePickUpLocationCode.title: Pick-up Location Code
xdm:vehiclePickUpLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle pick up.

xdm:vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.title: Different Drop-off Location
xdm:vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.description: Indicates if a vehicle reservation has a different drop-off location than the pick-up location.

xdm:groupCode.title: Group Code
xdm:groupCode.description: Group code string used in a reservation search.

xdm:couponCode.title: Coupon Code
xdm:couponCode.description: Coupon/promo code string used in a reservation search.

xdm:isFlexible.title: Reservation Search Is Flexibile
xdm:isFlexible.description: Tracks if a visitor selects a flexible date option for their reservation search.

xdm:productCode.title: Corporate Code
xdm:productCode.description: Corporate code string used in a reservation search.

xdm:rateType.title: Rate Type
xdm:rateType.description: Type of rate included in a reservation search.

xdm:itemComparison.description: Used to track lodging, flight, vehicle, or restaurant comparisons on a site or an app.

xdm:reservationAncillaryRevenue.title: Reservation Ancillary Revenue
xdm:reservationAncillaryRevenue.description: Protection and equipment revenue associated with a reservation.

xdm:reservationCancellation.title: Reservation Cancellation
xdm:reservationCancellation.description: Tracked when a reservation has been cancelled.

xdm:reservationCreated.title: Reservation Created
xdm:reservationCreated.description: Tracked when a reservation has been created.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: Currency code (i.e. 'USD' or 'GBP') used to make the purchase. ISO 4217 currency code.

xdm:reservationEndDate.title: Reservation End Date
xdm:reservationEndDate.description: The end drop-off/return/check-out date of the reservation.

xdm:reservationLength.title: Reservation Length
xdm:reservationLength.description: Tracks the number of days/nights  for a reservation.

xdm:reservationModification.title: Reservation Modification
xdm:reservationModification.description: Tracked when a reservation has been modified.

xdm:reservationNonRefundableAmount.title: Reservation Non-Refundable Amount
xdm:reservationNonRefundableAmount.description: Amount of the reservation price that is marked as non-refundable.

xdm:reservationNumberOfAdults.title: Reservation Number of Adults
xdm:reservationNumberOfAdults.description: Captures the number of adults associated with the reservation.

xdm:reservationNumberOfChildren.title: Reservation Number of Children
xdm:reservationNumberOfChildren.description: Captures the number of children associated with the reservation.

xdm:reservationPurpose.title: Reservation Purpose
xdm:reservationPurpose.description: Tracks the purpose of the reservation, typically either business or personal.

xdm:reservationRackRate.title: Reservation Rack Rate
xdm:reservationRackRate.description: Cost for the same day reservation without prior booking arrangements.

xdm:reservationStartDate.title: Reservation Start Date
xdm:reservationStartDate.description: The start pick-up/outbound/check-in date of the reservation.

xdm:reservationTripType.title: Reservation Trip Type
xdm:reservationTripType.description: Indicates if the reservation is for a one way, round trip, or multi-city.

xdm:reservationType.title: Reservation Type
xdm:reservationType.description: Records the type of reservation being placed.
